DOC.detailed_description: This study last approximately 1 month ( 4 week ) . Participants need attend one 1.5-hour orientation meeting , baseline assessment , train meeting , weekly 1-hour meeting four week ( 5 meeting total ) . Participants listen 2 podcasts per week encourage monitor exercise body weight track meal use provide wearable , wrist worn device .
